::Aerotaur::
    "Hmm.  I don't think we should mess with his memories.  If they come back 
it's his choice to stay with us or not.  I wouldn't feel right subjecting him 
to that.  If he accepts it on his own... I suppose I couldn't object to it."  
He grimaces and frowns.  "What about you Nightlight?  What do you think?"
